summary: Android mobile application using Flutter and Dart for door manufacturers to calculate rounded door sizes (internal use only), square feet, and quotations with multi-coating selection per door size (Single Coating, Double Coating, Double Coating + Sagwan Patti, Laminate), displaying one row per unique door size with separate coating columns, and PDF quotation generation with WhatsApp sharing. Displays actual entered size (with fraction support 0, 1/8, 2/8, 3/8, 4/8, 5/8, 6/8, 7/8), not rounded size. Quotations show only coating totals and total square feet.
architectural_notes: Custom rounding logic: height rounds to 72/75/78/80/84, width rounds to 30/32/34/36/38/40/42/48
Calculation formula: Sq.Ft = (Rounded Height × Rounded Width) / 144, Amount = Sq.Ft × Rate
Decimal precision: Sq.Ft rounded to 2 decimals, Amount rounded to nearest integer
Door type selection: Single Coating (165), Double Coating (185), Double Coating + Sagwan Patti (210), Laminate (240)
Calculation formula updated: Door Total = Sq.Ft × Rate × Quantity
Factory-friendly UI with large inputs, prominent buttons, and fixed bottom grand total
Dark/light mode support using Material Design theming
PDF generation with customer details (name, mobile, auto date)

existing_features.title: Create input form with three fields: Door Height (decimal input with placeholder '78.25'), Door Width (decimal input with placeholder '30.25'), and Rate per Sq.Ft (decimal input with default value 185). Include an 'Add Door' button to submit the form.
Display output section for each door entry showing: Final Rounded Size in format 'Height × Width' (e.g., '80 × 32'), Square Feet with 2 decimal places, and Amount as integer.
Display list of all door entries with each entry showing its rounded size, square feet, and amount. Include a delete button for each entry.
Display grand total section showing Total Square Feet (sum of all entries) and Total Amount (sum of all amounts). Update totals automatically when entries change.

Design a professional, clean interface suitable for door manufacturers and carpenters with warm wood-inspired tones (browns, natural tans, and forest greens). Use clear typography optimized for quick data entry and calculation review. Organize the layout with input form at top, door entry list in middle, and grand totals prominently displayed at bottom.
Add Quantity input field to the door entry form with default value of 1, accepting positive integers only
Add door type selection dropdown or radio button group with four options: Single Coating, Double Coating, Double Coating + Sagwan Patti, and Laminate

Implement automatic rate update when door type is selected: Single Coating defaults to 165, Double Coating to 185, Double Coating + Sagwan Patti to 210, and Laminate to 240. User can manually override the auto-filled rate value.
Update door entry output display to show door type, rounded size, square feet, rate, quantity, and total amount for each entry
Add Total Quantity field to the grand totals section that sums the quantity of all door entries
Enhance UI to be factory-friendly with larger input boxes, bigger Calculate/Add to List/Clear buttons, and ensure grand total section is fixed at the bottom of the viewport
Implement dark and light mode toggle with system preference detection, applying appropriate color schemes to all UI elements
Add customer information form with fields for customer name and mobile number to be included in quotations

Implement PDF quotation generation feature that includes customer name, mobile number, automatic current date, all door entries with details (door type, size, square feet, rate, quantity, amount), and grand totals (total square feet, total quantity, grand total amount)
Implement WhatsApp sharing feature that allows users to share the generated PDF quotation directly via WhatsApp
Add Clear/Reset button to the form that clears all input fields and resets them to default values (including door type selection, quantity to 1, and rate to its default)

Replace the single door type dropdown with a multi-selection checkbox list containing four options: Single Coating, Double Coating, Double Coating + Sagwan Patti, and Laminate. Allow users to select one or multiple door types simultaneously.

When the user adds a door entry with multiple door types selected, create separate door entries for each selected type with the same height, width, and quantity values. Each door type should calculate its own square feet and amount based on its respective default rate (Single Coating: 165, Double Coating: 185, Double Coating + Sagwan Patti: 210, Laminate: 240).

After the user clicks 'Generate Quotation PDF', automatically clear all added door entries from the list, reset all input fields (height, width, quantity, door type selections) to their default values, and reset all totals to zero.

Remove or hide the live total display cards (Total Square Feet, Total Quantity, Grand Total Amount) from the main screen. These values should only be visible inside the quotation preview and generated PDF.
Replace all dollar sign '$' symbols throughout the application with the Indian Rupee symbol '₹'. Format currency amounts with comma separators (e.g., ₹ 3,289, ₹ 12,450).
Display a confirmation message 'Quotation generated successfully. Entries cleared.' after the user generates a quotation and the entries are cleared.
Change door count logic to count only unique door sizes (height × width combinations). Multiple coating selections on the same size must count as a single door.

Replace the current door entries table structure with a new format having columns: Sr No | Size | Single Coating | Double Coating | Double Coating + Sagwan Patti | Laminate | Sq.Ft. Each row represents ONE unique door size with coating amounts shown in separate columns.
Remove all rate (₹/sq.ft) displays from the UI and PDF. Show only the final calculated amounts per coating type without showing the rate used for calculation.

Update the totals section to show only Total Square Feet and separate totals for each coating type (Single Coating, Double Coating, Double Coating + Sagwan Patti, Laminate). Remove Grand Total and Total Quantity displays.
Ensure the new table layout and totals structure are consistent between the app preview UI and the generated PDF quotation.
Update the confirmation message after quotation generation to display 'Quotation generated for X door size(s).' where X is the count of unique door sizes (not total entries).

Display the actual entered door size (not rounded size) in the door entries table and PDF quotations. Example: if user inputs 79 1/4 × 30 1/8, display exactly '79 1/4 × 30 1/8'. Rounded size must only be used internally for square footage calculations.

Add support for inch fractions in height and width input fields. Allowed fractions: 0, 1/8, 2/8, 3/8, 4/8, 5/8, 6/8, 7/8. Accept input as decimal (78.25) or fraction notation (78 2/8). Convert fraction input internally to decimal for calculations.
Remove Rate column and Quantity column from the door entries table display. Table must show only: Sr No | Size | Single Coating | Double Coating | Double Coating + Sagwan Patti | Laminate | Sq.Ft.

Fix WhatsApp PDF sharing functionality to generate an actual downloadable PDF file and use the device native share intent so WhatsApp can receive the PDF as a file attachment (not just a text message).
Update the confirmation message after quotation generation to display: 'Quotation generated based on actual size.'

Update PDF generation to use actual entered dimensions (with fractions if applicable) instead of rounded dimensions. Ensure table structure, totals section, and all formatting match the updated UI specifications.

new_feature_requests.summary: Input fields for door height, width (decimal allowed), and rate per sq.ft with default 185
Rounding logic for height (72/75/78/80/84) and width (30/32/34/36/38/40/42/48)
Calculate square feet from rounded dimensions, amount from rate, with proper decimal rounding
Display output section showing final rounded size, square feet, and amount
Support multiple door entries in a list with individual size, sq.ft, and amount
Grand total calculation displaying total square feet and total amount

Create backend data model for door entry with fields: height (decimal), width (decimal), rate per sq.ft (decimal, default 185), rounded height (integer), rounded width (integer), square feet (decimal rounded to 2 places), and amount (integer). Store multiple door entries in stable storage.
Implement height rounding logic in backend: if height <= 72 return 72, if height <= 75 return 75, if height <= 78 return 78, if height <= 80 return 80, else return 84.

Implement width rounding logic in backend: if width <= 30 return 30, if width <= 32 return 32, if width <= 34 return 34, if width <= 36 return 36, if width <= 38 return 38, if width <= 40 return 40, if width <= 42 return 42, else return 48.
Implement calculation logic in backend: Square Feet = (Rounded Height × Rounded Width) / 144 rounded to 2 decimal places, Amount = Square Feet × Rate rounded to nearest integer.

Create backend function to add a new door entry that accepts height, width, and rate, applies rounding logic, calculates square feet and amount, and returns the complete door entry with all calculated fields.
Create backend functions to retrieve all door entries, calculate grand total square feet (sum of all entries' square feet), and calculate grand total amount (sum of all entries' amounts).
Create backend function to delete a door entry by ID and recalculate totals.
Add Quantity input field (default 1) to door entry form
Implement door type selection (Single Coating, Double Coating, Double Coating + Sagwan Patti, Laminate) with corresponding default rates (165, 185, 210, 240)
Auto-update rate when door type is selected, allow manual rate override
Update calculation formula to: Door Total = Square Feet × Rate × Quantity
Display door type, rounded size, square feet, rate, quantity, and total amount in output
Show each door entry in card format with subtotal and delete option
Add Total Quantity to grand total section alongside Total Square Feet and Grand Total Amount
Implement factory-friendly UI with large input boxes, big Calculate/Add/Clear buttons, and fixed grand total section at bottom
Add dark and light mode support
Generate PDF quotation with customer name, mobile, and auto date
Implement WhatsApp sharing for quotation
Ensure offline functionality with no login requirement

Update backend door entry data model to include doorType (text), quantity (integer with default 1), and modify the amount calculation to: Amount = Square Feet × Rate × Quantity, rounded to nearest integer

Replace single door type dropdown with multi-selection checkbox list allowing users to select one or multiple door types (Single Coating, Double Coating, Double Coating + Sagwan Patti, Laminate) simultaneously, with each type calculating separately and adding to quotation list
Implement auto-clear functionality after quotation generation: clear all door entries, reset input fields (height, width, quantity, door type selections), and reset totals to zero
Hide live total display cards (Total Square Feet, Total Quantity, Grand Total Amount) from main screen; show these values only in quotation preview and generated PDF
Replace all currency symbols from '$' to Indian Rupee '₹' with proper formatting (e.g., ₹ 3,289)
Add confirmation message after quotation generation: 'Quotation generated successfully. Entries cleared.'
Refactor door count logic to count based ONLY on unique door size (height × width), not coating selections - multiple coatings on same size = 1 door

Replace door entries table structure with columns: Sr No | Size | Single Coating | Double Coating | Double Coating + Sagwan Patti | Laminate | Sq.Ft, where each row represents ONE unique door size with coating amounts in separate columns
Remove rate (₹/sq.ft) display from all UI elements and PDF - show only final calculated amounts per coating
Update totals section to show ONLY Total Square Feet and separate totals for each coating type (remove Grand Total and Total Quantity)
Update confirmation message to display 'Quotation generated for X door size(s).' based on unique door sizes
Update the square footage calculation formula to: Sq.Ft = (Rounded Height × Rounded Width) / 144. Update amount calculation to: Amount per coating = Sq.Ft × respective coating rate.
Refactor the backend data model to group door entries by unique size (height × width) and store coating selections as properties of each size group rather than separate entries.
Display ACTUAL entered door size (not rounded size) in table and PDF. Rounded size used only for internal calculation.
Add support for inch fractions in height/width inputs: 0, 1/8, 2/8, 3/8, 4/8, 5/8, 6/8, 7/8. Accept input as decimal (78.25) or fraction (78 2/8), convert to decimal internally for calculation.
Remove Rate column and Quantity column from table display.
Update totals section to show ONLY: Single Coating Total, Double Coating Total, Double Coating + Sagwan Patti Total, Laminate Total, Total Square Feet. Remove Grand Total and Total Quantity.
Fix WhatsApp PDF sharing: generate actual downloadable PDF file using device native share intent so WhatsApp can receive PDF as file attachment.
Update confirmation message after quotation generation to: 'Quotation generated based on actual size.'

Update backend data model to store both the actual entered size (as string with fractions if applicable) and the rounded size (for calculations). Modify the addDoor function to accept and store the original entered dimensions alongside rounded dimensions.

Update the totals section to display below the table with exactly these fields: Single Coating Total, Double Coating Total, Double Coating + Sagwan Patti Total, Laminate Total, and Total Square Feet. Remove Grand Total and Total Quantity displays.

Ensure the square footage calculation uses the formula: Sq.Ft = (Rounded Height × Rounded Width) / 144. Ensure amount calculation uses: Amount = Sq.Ft × coating rate (where coating rates are: Single Coating 165, Double Coating 185, Double Coating + Sagwan Patti 210, Laminate 240).
